= Configuring your setup =

=== Configurator ===
To configure your setup, first thing is to run the Configurator.
Read here the [http://code.google.com/p/arducopter/wiki/Quad_ConfiguratorTool how to].

=== Command Line Interface (CLI) ===

If you are planning to use a GPS, you have to set up the magnetometers with the CLI.
Here is an [http://code.google.com/p/arducopter/wiki/CLI how-to]

Those steps are a First-time setup and have to be done again only if you change something in the code.
